card.name: Phyrexian Reclamation
card.property: {1} {B}, Pay 2 life: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Death is no excuse to stop working.

card.name: Viashino Sandscout
card.property: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) At the beginning of the end step, return Viashino Sandscout to its owner's hand. (Return it only if it's on the battlefield.)

card.name: Fog of Gnats
card.property: Flying {B}: Regenerate Fog of Gnats.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You can swat a thousand gnats, but a thousand more will assail you.

card.name: Blessed Reversal
card.property: You gain 3 life for each creature attacking you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even an enemy is a valuable resource.

card.name: Erase
card.property: Exile target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Perception is more pleasing than truth.

card.name: Swat
card.property: Destroy target creature with power 2 or less. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Ticking Gnomes
card.property: Echo {3} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) Sacrifice Ticking Gnomes: It deals 1 damage to any target.

card.name: Shivan Phoenix
card.property: Flying When Shivan Phoenix dies, return Shivan Phoenix to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To strike down the phoenix is to slash at the flame.

card.name: Weatherseed Elf
card.property: {T}: Target creature gains forestwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My grandmother once told me the future of our world was inside the Weatherseed. When I touched it, I knew she was right."

card.name: Bloated Toad
card.property: Protection from blue Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Forbidding Watchtower
card.property: Forbidding Watchtower enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W}. {1}{W}: Forbidding Watchtower becomes a 1/5 white Soldier creature until end of turn. It's still a land.

card.name: Multani's Acolyte
card.property: Echo {G}{G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When Multani's Acolyte enters the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Opal Champion
card.property: When an opponent casts a creature spell, if Opal Champion is an enchantment, Opal Champion becomes a 3/3 Knight creature with first strike.

card.name: Faerie Conclave
card.property: Faerie Conclave enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U}. {1}{U}: Faerie Conclave becomes a 2/1 blue Faerie creature with flying until end of turn. It's still a land.

card.name: Raven Familiar
card.property: Flying Echo {2}{U} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When Raven Familiar enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Iron Will
card.property: Target creature gets +0/+4 until end of turn. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Ostracize
card.property: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a creature card from it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kerrick was to find that some borders can never be crossed.

card.name: Karmic Guide
card.property: Flying, protection from black Echo {3}{W}{W} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When Karmic Guide enters the battlefield, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Simian Grunts
card.property: Flash Echo {2}{G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)

card.name: Rebuild
card.property: Return all artifacts to their owners' hands. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Ghitu Encampment
card.property: Ghitu Encampment enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R}. {1}{R}: Ghitu Encampment becomes a 2/1 red Warrior creature with first strike until end of turn. It's still a land. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

card.name: Martyr's Cause
card.property: Sacrifice a creature: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to any target this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Multani, Maro-Sorcerer
card.property: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Multani, Maro-Sorcerer's power and toughness are each equal to the total number of cards in all players' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To make peace with the forest, make peace with me." —Multani, to Urza

card.name: Engineered Plague
card.property: As Engineered Plague enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. All creatures of the chosen type get -1/-1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The admixture of bitterwort in the viral brew has produced most favorable results." —Phyrexian progress notes

card.name: About Face
card.property: Switch target creature's power and toughness until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The overconfident are the most vulnerable.

card.name: Cessation
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack. When Cessation is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Cessation to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The face of Light will shine upon them, and they will know war no more." —Song of All, canto 918

card.name: No Mercy
card.property: Whenever a creature deals damage to you, destroy it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We had years to prepare, while they had mere minutes." —Kerrick, sleeper agent

card.name: Goblin Medics
card.property: Whenever Goblin Medics becomes tapped, it deals 1 damage to any target.

card.name: Anthroplasm
card.property: Anthroplasm enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. {X}, {T}: Remove all +1/+1 counters from Anthroplasm and put X +1/+1 counters on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: I never metamorphosis I didn't like.

card.name: Bouncing Beebles
card.property: Bouncing Beebles can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Beebles are frequently hurled against stone surfaces at high speed but always zing back into the air with a giggle.

card.name: Tragic Poet
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Tragic Poet: Return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I would weep, but my tears have been stolen; I would shout, but my voice has been taken. Thus, I write."

card.name: Delusions of Mediocrity
card.property: When Delusions of Mediocrity enters the battlefield, you gain 10 life. When Delusions of Mediocrity leaves the battlefield, you lose 10 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When nothing but second best will do.

card.name: Archivist
card.property: {T}: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some do. Some teach. The rest look it up.

card.name: Palinchron
card.property: Flying When Palinchron enters the battlefield, untap up to seven lands. {2}{U}{U}: Return Palinchron to its owner's hand.

card.name: Memory Jar
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Memory Jar: Each player exiles all cards from their hand face down and draws seven cards. At the beginning of the next end step, each player discards their hand and returns to their hand each card they exiled this way.

card.name: Walking Sponge
card.property: {T}: Target creature loses your choice of flying, first strike, or trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not only does it catch fish, it cleans them too.

card.name: Pygmy Pyrosaur
card.property: Pygmy Pyrosaur can't block. {R}: Pygmy Pyrosaur gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Do not judge a lizard by its size. —Ghitu proverb

card.name: Grim Monolith
card.property: Grim Monolith doesn't untap during your untap step. {T}: Add {C}{C}{C}. {4}: Untap Grim Monolith.

card.name: Defense Grid
card.property: Each spell costs {3} more to cast except during its controller's turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We've managed to keep the goblins in their assigned areas, but there's little we can do about the smell." —Whip Tongue, viashino technician

card.name: Phyrexian Plaguelord
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Phyrexian Plaguelord: Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn. Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The final stage of the illness: delirium, convulsions, and death." —Phyrexian progress notes

card.name: Parch
card.property: Choose one — • Parch deals 2 damage to any target. • Parch deals 4 damage to target blue creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your porous flesh betrays you." —Fire Eye, viashino bey

card.name: Multani's Presence
card.property: Whenever a spell you've cast is countered, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When a tree falls in the forest, Multani hears it.

card.name: Harmonic Convergence
card.property: Put all enchantments on top of their owners' libraries.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the eternal stars align, can mere mortals resist?

card.name: Devout Harpist
card.property: {T}: Destroy target Aura attached to a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The notes themselves are irrelevant. The music's effect, however, is worth ten armies.

card.name: King Crab
card.property: {1} {U}, {T}: Put target green creature on top of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'm allergic to shellfish—not only did it kill my entire village, it also gave me this nasty rash." —Olivia, fisher

card.name: Bone Shredder
card.property: Flying Echo {2}{B} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When Bone Shredder enters the battlefield, destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature.

card.name: Avalanche Riders
card.property: Haste Echo {3}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When Avalanche Riders enters the battlefield, destroy target land.

card.name: Ghitu War Cry
card.property: {R}: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The war cry is not simply a shout but a sacrament.

card.name: Iron Maiden
card.property: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, Iron Maiden deals X damage to that player, where X is the number of cards in their hand minus 4.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The maiden is a jealous lover.

card.name: Spawning Pool
card.property: Spawning Pool enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B}. {1}{B}: Spawning Pool becomes a 1/1 black Skeleton creature with "{B}: Regenerate this creature" until end of turn. It's still a land. (If it regenerates, the next time it would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

card.name: Urza's Blueprints
card.property: Echo {6} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) {T}: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From concept to paper to reality.

card.name: Opal Avenger
card.property: When you have 10 or less life, if Opal Avenger is an enchantment, Opal Avenger becomes a 3/5 Soldier creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the sun grew cold in the realm, the statue grew warm.

card.name: Impending Disaster
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are seven or more lands on the battlefield, sacrifice Impending Disaster and destroy all lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The goblins are in charge of maintenance? Why not just set it on fire now and call it a day?" —Whip Tongue, viashino technician

card.name: Intervene
card.property: Counter target spell that targets a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "At first I simply observed. But I found that without investment in others, life serves no purpose." —Karn, silver golem

card.name: Thornwind Faeries
card.property: Flying {T}: Thornwind Faeries deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Guarding the ship is the Thornwinds' first concern. Getting along with the locals ranks fourth or fifth at best.

card.name: Last-Ditch Effort
card.property: Sacrifice any number of creatures. Last-Ditch Effort deals that much damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you're gonna lose, at least make sure they don't win as much." —Jula, goblin raider

card.name: Might of Oaks
card.property: Target creature gets +7/+7 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Suddenly, she couldn't see the acorns for the trees.

card.name: Tinker
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact. Search your library for an artifact card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I wonder how it feels to be bored." —Jhoira, artificer

card.name: Treetop Village
card.property: Treetop Village enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G}. {1}{G}: Treetop Village becomes a 3/3 green Ape creature with trample until end of turn. It's still a land. (If it would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

card.name: Thran War Machine
card.property: Echo {4} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) Thran War Machine attacks each combat if able.

card.name: Phyrexian Debaser
card.property: Flying {T}, Sacrifice Phyrexian Debaser: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The second stage of the illness: high fever and severe infectiousness." —Phyrexian progress notes

card.name: Frantic Search
card.property: Draw two cards, then discard two cards. Untap up to three lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Motivation was high in the academy once students realized flunking their exams could kill them.

card.name: Granite Grip
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 for each Mountain you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There's beauty in the desert—but it's best to view it from afar.

card.name: Levitation
card.property: Creatures you control have flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Barrin's pride in his apprentice was diminished somewhat when he had to get the others back down.

card.name: Sluggishness
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't block. When Sluggishness is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Sluggishness to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Vark decided to lie down and think of a good excuse to quit working.

card.name: Beast of Burden
card.property: Beast of Burden's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If it is meant to be nothing but a machine," Karn finally asked Jhoira, "why did Urza build it to be like me?"

card.name: Radiant's Dragoons
card.property: Echo {3}{W} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When Radiant's Dragoons enters the battlefield, you gain 5 life.

card.name: Gang of Elk
card.property: Whenever Gang of Elk becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The elk is Gaea's favorite, who wears the forest on its brow.

card.name: Cloud of Faeries
card.property: Flying When Cloud of Faeries enters the battlefield, untap up to two lands. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Sick and Tired
card.property: Two target creatures each get -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Phyrexians' only interest in organic life is discerning its weakness.

card.name: Jhoira's Toolbox
card.property: {2}: Regenerate target artifact creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It entertained Jhoira to craft a kit that could bring her the tools.

card.name: Goblin Welder
card.property: {T}: Choose target artifact a player controls and target artifact card in that player's graveyard. If both targets are still legal as this ability resolves, that player simultaneously sacrifices the artifact and returns the artifact card to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I wrecked your metal guy, boss. But look! I made you an ashtray."

card.name: Repopulate
card.property: Shuffle all creature cards from target player's graveyard into that player's library. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Yavimaya Granger
card.property: Echo {2}{G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When Yavimaya Granger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Vigilant Drake
card.property: Flying {2}{U}: Untap Vigilant Drake.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Awake and awing in the blink of an eye.

card.name: Sustainer of the Realm
card.property: Flying Whenever Sustainer of the Realm blocks, it gets +0/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The harder you push, the stronger we become." —Radiant, to Urza

card.name: Slow Motion
card.property: Enchant creature At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player sacrifices that creature unless they pay {2}. When Slow Motion is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Slow Motion to its owner's hand.

card.name: Tethered Skirge
card.property: Flying Whenever Tethered Skirge becomes the target of a spell or ability, you lose 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It bites the hand that leads it.

card.name: Hope and Glory
card.property: Untap two target creatures. Each of them gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Serra ruled by faith. I cannot afford that luxury." —Radiant, archangel

card.name: Quicksilver Amulet
card.property: {4}, {T}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Wonderful! You got a lion on your first try. Now put it back."

card.name: Unearth
card.property: Return target creature card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Defender of Chaos
card.property: Flash Protection from white

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some knights will not follow orders—only disorder.

card.name: Peace and Quiet
card.property: Destroy two target enchantments.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In time our realm will shine again. But it will gleam only when we scour away the taint of doubt." —Radiant, archangel

card.name: Darkwatch Elves
card.property: Protection from black Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Defender of Law
card.property: Flash Protection from red

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is not my place to question Radiant's rule. I exist to enforce her will."

card.name: Molten Hydra

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Keep off the glass. —Hydra warning sign

card.name: Thran Lens
card.property: All permanents are colorless.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Every device in the rig is evidence of Thran enlightenment. All mana was the same to them, whether from rock or water, growth or decay. Can you imagine such unity of vision?" —Urza, journal

card.name: Treefolk Mystic
card.property: Whenever Treefolk Mystic blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, destroy all Auras attached to that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Urza's wards fell from him like autumn leaves as he entered the dreaming grove. He awoke imprisoned in living wood.

card.name: Miscalculation
card.property: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Viashino Heretic
card.property: {1} {R}, {T}: Destroy target artifact. Viashino Heretic deals damage to that artifact's controller equal to the artifact's converted mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The past is buried for good reason."

card.name: Wing Snare
card.property: Destroy target creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Argoth's doom rained from a clear sky. Yavimaya will not share that fate." —Multani, maro-sorcerer

card.name: Lone Wolf
card.property: You may have Lone Wolf assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A wolf without a pack is either a survivor or a brute.

card.name: Opportunity
card.property: Target player draws four cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He cocooned himself alone in his workshop for months. When he finally emerged, all broad grins and excited chatter, I knew he'd found his answer." —Barrin, master wizard

card.name: Planar Collapse
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are four or more creatures on the battlefield, sacrifice Planar Collapse and destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With heavy heart, Urza doused one world's light to rekindle another's.

card.name: Yavimaya Scion
card.property: Protection from artifacts

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each time the saw blade bit, the tree spat it out.

card.name: Scrapheap
card.property: Whenever an artifact or enchantment is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Junk heaps have rats, but scrapheaps have goblins.

card.name: Viashino Bey
card.property: If Viashino Bey attacks, all creatures you control attack if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the bey runs, match his stride. —Viashino saying

card.name: Subversion
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses 1 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kerrick's corrupt domain swelled like a blister on Tolaria's skin.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If the sun ever hit the swamp, where would these scurry to?

card.name: Rank and File
card.property: When Rank and File enters the battlefield, green creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Left, right, left, right . . . hmm. Okay—left, left, left, left, . . ."

card.name: Crop Rotation
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a land. Search your library for a land card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Weatherseed Faeries
card.property: Flying, protection from red

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Two days after the forge was completed, the faeries were immune to its flames.

card.name: Rack and Ruin
card.property: Destroy two target artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My people are bound by masters centuries dead. Each artifact we destroy is another link broken in that chain." —Barb Tail, viashino heretic

card.name: Phyrexian Denouncer
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Phyrexian Denouncer: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The first stage of the illness: rash and nausea." —Phyrexian progress notes

card.name: Mother of Runes
card.property: {T}: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

card.name: Silk Net
card.property: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains reach until end of turn. (It can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes it's possible to pull a meal out of thin air.

card.name: Phyrexian Defiler
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Phyrexian Defiler: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The third stage of the illness: muscle aches and persistent cough." —Phyrexian progress notes

card.name: Hidden Gibbons
card.property: When an opponent casts an instant spell, if Hidden Gibbons is an enchantment, Hidden Gibbons becomes a 4/4 Ape creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When these apes want something, it's a matter of gibbon take.

card.name: Weatherseed Treefolk
card.property: Trample When Weatherseed Treefolk dies, return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Treacherous Link
card.property: Enchant creature All damage that would be dealt to enchanted creature is dealt to its controller instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You cannot possibly know the toll your alliances will exact from you." —Barrin, to Urza

card.name: Snap
card.property: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Untap up to two lands.

card.name: Burst of Energy
card.property: Untap target permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I stand ready to die for our world. Who will stand with me?" —Radiant, archangel

card.name: Pyromancy
card.property: {3}, Discard a card at random: Pyromancy deals damage to any target equal to the converted mana cost of the discarded card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Who harnesses fire controls the world. —Ghitu proverb

card.name: Angel's Trumpet
card.property: All creatures have vigilance. At the beginning of each player's end step, tap all untapped creatures that player controls that didn't attack this turn. Angel's Trumpet deals damage to the player equal to the number of creatures tapped this way.

card.name: Plague Beetle
card.property: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is the harbinger of disease, not the carrier.

card.name: Ghitu Slinger
card.property: Echo {2}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When Ghitu Slinger enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you survive a slinger attack, the slinger wished you to live.

card.name: Brink of Madness
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have no cards in hand, sacrifice Brink of Madness and target opponent discards their hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The fools thought me dead. But I built an empire inside my tomb." —Kerrick, sleeper agent

card.name: Fleeting Image
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {1}{U}: Return Fleeting Image to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Horas swore off drinking, but after meeting the creature a second time he decided he'd better start again.

card.name: Thran Weaponry
card.property: Echo {4} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) You may choose not to untap Thran Weaponry during your untap step. {2}, {T}: All creatures get +2/+2 for as long as Thran Weaponry remains tapped.

card.name: Phyrexian Broodlings
card.property: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Phyrexian Broodlings.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With limited resources and near unlimited time, Kerrick used parts from one beast to build another.

card.name: Second Chance
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have 5 or less life, sacrifice Second Chance and take an extra turn after this one.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The greatest gift is the opportunity to right one's wrongs.

card.name: Radiant, Archangel
card.property: Flying, vigilance Radiant, Archangel gets +1/+1 for each other creature with flying on the battlefield.

card.name: Rancor
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has trample. When Rancor is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Rancor to its owner's hand.

card.name: Wheel of Torture
card.property: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, Wheel of Torture deals X damage to that player, where X is 3 minus the number of cards in their hand.

card.name: Yavimaya Wurm
card.property: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the gorilla playfully grabbed the wurm's tail, the wurm doubled back and playfully ate the gorilla's head.

card.name: Sleeper's Guile
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has fear. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) When Sleeper's Guile is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Sleeper's Guile to its owner's hand.

card.name: Rivalry
card.property: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, if that player controls more lands than each other player, Rivalry deals 2 damage to them.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The goblins revered it; the viashino defended it. Only Urza understood it.

card.name: Ghitu Fire-Eater
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Ghitu Fire-Eater: It deals damage equal to its power to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They are called 'Mi'uto,' which means 'one use.'" —Jhoira, artificer

card.name: Lurking Skirge
card.property: When a creature is put into an opponent's graveyard from the battlefield, if Lurking Skirge is an enchantment, Lurking Skirge becomes a 3/2 Imp creature with flying.

card.name: Deranged Hermit
card.property: Echo {3}{G}{G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When Deranged Hermit enters the battlefield, create four 1/1 green Squirrel creature tokens. Squirrel creatures get +1/+1.

card.name: Damping Engine
card.property: A player who controls more permanents than each other player can't play lands or cast artifact, creature, or enchantment spells. That player may sacrifice a permanent for that player to ignore this effect until end of turn.

card.name: Purify
card.property: Destroy all artifacts and enchantments.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our Mother! The sky was Her hair; the sun, Her face. She danced on the grass and in the hills." —Song of All, canto 23

card.name: Aura Flux
card.property: Other enchantments have "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this enchantment unless you pay {2}."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To some, the Tolarian sunrise was a blinding flash; to others, a lingering glow.

card.name: Viashino Cutthroat
card.property: Haste At the beginning of the end step, return Viashino Cutthroat to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You guys go on ahead. I'll catch up with ya." —Vark, goblin scout, last words

card.name: Radiant's Judgment
card.property: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Lava Axe
card.property: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.

card.name: Knighthood
card.property: Creatures you control have first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He has returned. He who brought the dark ones. He who poisoned our paradise. How shall we greet him? With swift and certain death!" —Radiant, archangel

card.name: Expendable Troops
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Expendable Troops: It deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No doubt in their minds, no fear in their hearts.

card.name: Angelic Curator
card.property: Flying, protection from artifacts

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do not treat your people as you treat your artifacts. Let them go, and they will live; seal them here, and they will die." —Urza, to Radiant

card.name: Crawlspace
card.property: No more than two creatures can attack you each combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The goblins did not understand their attraction to the mana rig. They simply knew it was where they belonged.

card.name: Ring of Gix
card.property: Echo {3} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) {1}, {T}: Tap target artifact, creature, or land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not every cage is made of bars.

card.name: Eviscerator
card.property: Protection from white When Eviscerator enters the battlefield, you lose 5 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It roamed the time bubble like a captured animal. Kerrick knew he must soon find a way to unleash it on Tolaria or destroy it.

card.name: Defense of the Heart
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls three or more creatures, sacrifice Defense of the Heart, search your library for up to two creature cards, and put those cards onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
